rule.ruleJSON: {"type":"JSValidate","script":"// $pmc.actions\u000aif (system.vars.$pmc_actions!=null) {\u000a/*\u000a var tmpValue = new SCDatum();\u000a tmpValue.setType(8);\u000a tmpValue.push(system.vars.$pmc_actions);\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions= tmpValue;\u000a*/\u000a} else {\u000a var tmpValue = new SCDatum();\u000a tmpValue.setType(8);\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions= tmpValue;\u000a}\u000a\u000a\u000a// journal update\u000aif(null==system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order) {\u000a system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order=1;\u000a}\u000a\u000aif(system.vars.$G_bg && null!=system.vars.$G_bg_activity_type) {\u000a if(null!=system.vars.$G_bg_activity_text) {\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions=system.vars.$G_bg_activity_text;\u000a } else {\u000a var tmpValue = new SCDatum();\u000a tmpValue.setType(8);\u000a tmpValue.push(\"No update provided.\");\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions= tmpValue;\u000a }\u000a if(null!=system.vars.$G_bg_activity_type) {\u000a system.vars.$apm_activity=system.vars.$G_bg_activity_type;\u000a }\u000a if(null==system.vars.$apm_activity) {\u000a var tmpValue = new SCDatum();\u000a tmpValue.setType(8);\u000a tmpValue.push(\"external update\");\u000a system.vars.$apm_activity= tmpValue;\u000a }\u000a}\u000a\u000aif(null!=system.vars.$lo_ufname) {\u000a system.vars.$L_operator=system.vars.$lo_ufname;\u000a} else {\u000a system.vars.$L_operator=system.functions.operator();\u000a}\u000a\u000a\u000aif(null==system.vars.$L_operator) {\u000a system.vars.$L_operator=\"NULL\";\u000a}\u000a\u000avar emptyArray = new SCDatum();\u000aemptyArray.setType(8);\u000a\u000asystem.vars.$L_stamp=\"----\"+system.functions.str(system.functions.tod())+\" (\"+system.vars.$L_operator+\"):\";\u000aif(system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.exit) {\u000a system.vars.$L_stamp=\"----\"+system.functions.str(system.functions.tod())+\" \"+system.vars.$lo_time_zone+\" (\"+system.vars.$L_operator+\"):\";\u000a}\u000asystem.vars.$L_operator_clock_name=\"Time locked by : \"+system.functions.operator();\u000asystem.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions);\u000aif (system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm && system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order==2 && (system.functions.lng(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions))>1 || !system.functions.same(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions),emptyArray) )) { //&& denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions~={}) -- it is always unknow\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action.push(system.vars.$L_stamp);\u000a}\u000aif (system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm && system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order==2 && (system.functions.lng(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions))>1 || !system.functions.same(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions),emptyArray))) {\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action = system.functions.denull(system.vars.$L_file.update_action);\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions = system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions);\u000a for(var i=0; i<system.vars.$pmc_actions.length(); i++) {\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action.push(system.vars.$pmc_actions[i]);// append the vars.$pmc_actions to the end of array\u000a }\u000a}\u000a\u000aif (system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm && system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order==1 && (system.functions.lng(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions))>1 || !system.functions.same(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions),emptyArray))) {\u000a system.vars.$pmc_actions = system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions);\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action = system.functions.denull(system.vars.$L_file.update_action);\u000a for(var i=system.vars.$pmc_actions.length()-1; i>=0; i--) {\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action.unshift(system.vars.$pmc_actions[i]);// insert the vars.$pmc_actions to the beginning of array\u000a }\u000a}\u000aif (system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm && system.vars.$G_pm_global_environment.journal_pm_order==1 && (system.functions.lng(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions))>1 || !system.functions.same(system.functions.denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions),emptyArray))) {// && denull(system.vars.$pmc_actions~={}) -- it is always unknow\u000a system.vars.$L_file.update_action.unshift(system.vars.$L_stamp);\u000a}\u000a\u000a"}
